sentences.english: Mount Langya, which stands on the southwest outskirts of Chuzhou in Anhui Province, is well known for its scenic charm.
sentences.chinese: 安徽省滁州市西南郊的琅玡山，向以山水醉人著称。

sentences.english: The Langya culture came into being in major environment of Yanqi culture.
sentences.chinese: 琅琊文化在燕齐文化的大环境中形成。

sentences.english: Langye Wang was influenced by the culture of seaside region and had the Tianshi religion faith in generate.
sentences.chinese: 琅邪王氏受滨海地域文化之熏习，世代信仰天师道。

sentences.english: Good morning, this is Longmarch Bowling Center.
sentences.chinese: 早上好，这里是琅迈保龄球馆。

definition: (archaic) to give birth to a child/to rear

to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
